rsvp.description: This is a convenient alias for `RSVP.Promise.all`.
rsvp.name: all

params.name: label
params.description:
An optional label. This is useful
for tooling.

rsvp.name: allSettled

params.name: label
params.description:
- optional string that describes the promise.
Useful for tooling.

return.description:
promise that is fulfilled with an array of the settled
states of the constituent promises.

rsvp.name: defer

params.name: label
params.description:
optional string for labeling the promise.
Useful for tooling.

rsvp.name: denodeify

params.name: nodeFunc
params.description:
a 'node-style' function that takes a callback as
its last argument. The callback expects an error to be passed as its first
argument (if an error occurred, otherwise null), and the value from the
operation as its second argument ('function(err, value){ }').

params.name: options
params.description:
An optional paramter that if set
to `true` causes the promise to fulfill with the callback's success arguments
as an array. This is useful if the node function has multiple success
paramters. If you set this paramter to an array with names, the promise will
fulfill with a hash with these names as keys and the success parameters as
values.

return.description:
a function that wraps `nodeFunc` to return an
`RSVP.Promise`

rsvp.name: filter

params.name: filterFn
params.description:
- function to be called on each resolved value to
 filter the final results.

params.name: label
params.description:
optional string describing the promise. Useful for
 tooling.

rsvp.name: hash

params.name: label
params.description:
optional string that describes the promise.
Useful for tooling.

return.description:
promise that is fulfilled when all properties of `promises`
have been fulfilled, or rejected if any of them become rejected.

rsvp.name: hashSettled

params.name: label
params.description:
optional string that describes the promise.
Useful for tooling.

return.description:
promise that is fulfilled when when all properties of `promises`
have been settled.

rsvp.name: map

params.name: mapFn
params.description: function to be called on each fulfilled promise.

params.name: label
params.description:
optional string for labeling the promise.
 Useful for tooling.

return.description:
promise that is fulfilled with the result of calling
 `mapFn` on each fulfilled promise or value when they become fulfilled.
  The promise will be rejected if any of the given `promises` become rejected.

rsvp.description: This is a convenient alias for `RSVP.Promise.race`.
rsvp.name: race

params.name: label
params.description:
An optional label. This is useful
for tooling.

rsvp.description: This is a convenient alias for `RSVP.Promise.reject`.
rsvp.name: reject

params.name: reason
params.description: value that the returned promise will be rejected with.

params.name: label
params.description:
optional string for identifying the returned promise.
Useful for tooling.

return.description: a promise rejected with the given `reason`.

rsvp.description: This is a convenient alias for `RSVP.Promise.resolve`.
rsvp.name: resolve

params.name: value
params.description: value that the returned promise will be resolved with

params.name: label
params.description:
optional string for identifying the returned promise.
Useful for tooling.

return.description:
a promise that will become fulfilled with the given
`value`

rsvp.name: rethrow
